name: Coffee (whirlybirdman)
description:
a second weekly game made with a prompt from Sebastian Lague's game idea generator https://seblague.github.io/ideagenerator/

the prompt was "A game about growing up that takes place in the distant future, where you play as a monster who is addicted to coffee trying to explore the world."

this time i spent most of my effort on trying to get the bloody colliders to work and the worst part is the actual fix was so simple it was trying to find the problem that was excruciating pain

overall there's still a few issues with the collider and i wish i could have implemented the coffee system i planned from the beginning, but alas, i didn't have time

at least it's still better than the last one

MUSIC BY KEVIN MACLEOD
song list: impact lento, arcadia, dreamy flashback, frost waltz, bathed in the light
(yes these are some of the ones used in kerbal space program)
